channel.title: HUGE problem with VPS?
channel.description:
Hi guys,
This topic calls for someone with extreme knowledge in this matter. Also, if this is posted in the wrong section, can a Moderator please move it?
Last night I purchased a basic plan of VPS from Optic VPS for my Private Server. I cannot find ANYTHING that will help me upload my files to the Dedicated. There is no software or program included. [b]Below is a picture of the only real thing I see. Can someone PLEASE help me, I have sent in 2 support tickets, and have gotten no response...[/b]
[URL=http://img696.imageshack.us/i/98427898.jpg/][IMG]http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/6614/98427898.jpg[/img][/URL]
Thanks, Situations

item.title: HUGE problem with VPS?
item.dc:creator: @darscape darscape
item.description:
@darscape wrote:

I have this slight tingling sensation thats telling me he probably never read the welcome email with the login details for each service provided for the VPS.

Read full topic

item.title: HUGE problem with VPS?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Belong’s in the help section.

ontopic: Use the remote desktop connection. Google some information on it.

Read full topic

item.title: HUGE problem with VPS?
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

For ubuntu use a VNC server.

Read full topic

item.title: HUGE problem with VPS?
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:2, topic:320960”][quote author=trollmuch link=topic=417411.msg3069098#msg3069098 date=1261422165]
How is he fucked if its linux?

You will be emailed your connect info im sure soon.
[/quote]

If he is posting on a forum asking for help expecting to find somewhere to upload files within his hosting control panel, not knowing how to actually SSH or RDP in then it’s clear he has no experience with servers what-so-ever which means it’s very, very unlikely that he will be able to administrate a Linux operating system. Someone the other day ordered a ‘linux dedi’ not having any Linux experience what-so-ever and ended up having to get a refund as he had no-idea how to even connect to it.

So yes, if he’s ordered a Linux VPS I’d safely say he’s going to be fucked. We’ll see.[/quote]

You always try and make things out to be harder than they really are. Quit acting as if the kid can’t learn.

Read full topic

item.title: HUGE problem with VPS?
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

I didn’t know how to login? A friend told me what to download etc.

item.title: HUGE problem with VPS?
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

Oh really? Funny, how i managed to run and “administrate” a server with no previous coding experience or linux VPS experience for 2 months and having a peak of 70+ users online at a time… It’s amazing how people adapt and learn how to do things when pointed in the correct direction.

Read full topic

Windows: use remote desktop

Simple as that.
